title: Font Match / 'CUP 2': handpainted coffee shop sign
content:
I have a client that is having a sign painted for their coffee shop - and wants me to create a digital version as close as possible. Any suggestions on a typeface that I can bevel that would match this artist rendition? [img:SCAN0001\_5708.jpg

Thanks.
author: imperium

comments.content: I'm pretty sure you'd be better off re-drawing it in vector. I'm pretty sure it's not based off of any font in particular.
That's what I was worried about. Thanks.
